column4: is there a grub command to look at what is installed at the MBA currently?
no, but you can use dd + xxd to get a hexdump
it wont be understandable tho will it?
like dd if=/dev/hda bs=512 count=1 | xxd
i just want to verify that grub actually worked.
well, only if you know what should be there :)
well, is it bad if i see both LILO and GRUB in the first block of the drive?
i just see both strings in the block
don't care, if your bootloader works
the second is within "GRUB .Geom.Hard Disk.Read. Error."
thats why im trying to verify grub is successfully installing or not.
reran the install and did it manually
